name: SizeSummary
description: type interface that can be used to summarize multiple files

numberOfFiles.description: if this is about multiple files, the number of files is specified here

linesPerFile.description: rounded, amount of lines per file (averaged)

charactersPerLine.description: rounded, amount of characters per line (averaged)

bytesPerCharacter.description: rounded, amount of bytes per character
